sentences.en: After an artillery bombardment lasting several days the town finally succumbed.
sentences.cn: 在持续炮轰数日后,该城终于屈服了.

sentences.en: Enemy forces lobbed a series of artillery shells onto the city.
sentences.cn: 敌军对该城发起连串炮轰。

sentences.en: Our artillery opened up and we heard a fearful wailing and screeching.
sentences.cn: 我们的炮弹一发，便听到可怕的哀号声和尖叫声。

sentences.en: Our infantry was protected by a curtain of artillery fire.
sentences.cn: 我们的步兵在炮兵火力掩护之下.

sentences.en: Our militia fired off volley after volley from antiaircraft artillery.
sentences.cn: 我民兵的高射炮连续射击.

sentences.en: Rebel artillery units have regularly bombarded the airport.
sentences.cn: 叛军的炮兵部队经常轰炸机场。

sentences.en: Rockets, mortars and artillery rounds rained on buildings.
sentences.cn: 火箭炮、迫击炮和各种炮弹如雨点般落在大楼上。

sentences.en: Some of those artillery pieces look a little elderly.
sentences.cn: 那些大炮中有些看起来有点老掉牙了。

sentences.en: The artillery was deployed to bear on the fort.
sentences.cn: 火炮是对着那个碉堡部署的.

sentences.en: The city has been flattened by heavy artillery bombardments.
sentences.cn: 城市已被猛烈的炮火夷为平地。

sentences.en: The commandos pushed forward under the covering fire of their artillery.
sentences.cn: 突击队在炮兵的火力掩护下向前推进.

sentences.en: The town is under heavy artillery fire.
sentences.cn: 该市镇处于密集的炮火之下。

sentences.en: The two sides exchanged fire with artillery, mortars and small arms.
sentences.cn: 双方交火时动用了大炮、迫击炮和轻武器。

sentences.en: They blitzed the capital with tanks, artillery, anti-aircraft weapons and machine guns.
sentences.cn: 他们动用坦克、大炮、防空武器和机关枪奇袭了首都。

sentences.en: Using tanks and heavy artillery, they seized the town.
sentences.cn: 他们倚仗坦克和重型火炮占领了这个镇。

trans.tran_en: large guns, either on wheels or fixed in one place
